dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7038 IH: Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Morelle introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to fund the information clearinghouse through fiscal year 2029, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2022.
Section 26 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1769g(d)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting , including information with respect to the utilization of trained volunteers, after provide information; and
by inserting resources that address ways to prevent hunger, after food assistance, ; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking and $250,000 for each of fiscal years 2010 through 2022 and inserting and $750,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2029.
